item.title: physics714
item.description: Advanced Accelerator Physics (E/A) - physics714 Course Advanced Accelerator Physics (E/A) Course No. physics714 Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Lecture with exercises English 3+1 6 ST/WT Requirements: Preparation: Accelerator Physics (physics612) Form of Testing and Examination: Requirements for the examination (written or oral): successful work with the exercises Length of Course: 1 semester Aims of the Course: Understanding of the physics of synchrotron radiation and its influence on beam parameters
